description: Conversion of garage into habitable space, erection of single storey front and rear extension. Roof extension with rear dormer and juliet balcony and installation of 2 nos front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed front extension would result in a discordant and incongruous feature that would upset the rhythm of the streetscene, and general uniformity of this area of Hatch Place, and which would be out of keeping with the character and appearance of the original property and would be detrimental to the visual amenities of the area, thereby conflicting with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The proposed front extension would result in insufficient room to accommodate off street car parking at the application site and place undue pressure on the already limited off-street parking availability, contrary to Policy Guidance 38 of guidance in the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames Residential Design Guide SPD (2013), Policy DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012 and the NPPF 2021.
